name: heat and power co-generation unit construction, 1MWel | heat and power co-generation unit, organic Rankine cycle, 1MWe, 6.4 MWth | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/13419/documentation

This dataset comprises the reference flow 'heat and power cogeneration unit 1MW electric 6.4 MWt'. This data set is based on a data set comprised in the book 'Energy from the earth'. (see field 'published source' for more details). The inventory for the heat and power generating unit is basically taken from (Bauer, 2007). The inventory reflects Swiss conditions, used as first approximation for GLO. Uncertainties adjusted accordingly.

Material and energy for construction of the cogeneration unit.

Cogeneration unit.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Represents installation of a deep geothermal power plant in Switzerland. Used as first approximation for GLO. Uncertainties adjusted accordingly.

publication.name: S Hirchberg, S Wiemer, P Burgherr2015

exchanges.description:
Literature value/estimation. The amount of the steel mass is estimated based on a 1 MW plant in (Rogge, 2004).
Weights of the different ORC components:  Evaporator (11 t),
boiler (4 t), turbine (3 t), generator (4 t), pump for working fluid
(1 t), condenser of the organic circulating fluid (16 t)
Rogge, S. (2004). Geothermische Stromerzeugung in Deutschland Ã–konomie , Ã–kologie und Potenziale. Technical University Berlin, Germany.

Calculated from an input of 300 kg Perfluoropentane (Density 1.664 g/ml) and a density of 0.874 g/ml for Benzene.

Potenziale. Technical University Berlin, Germany.
